content: Way to go Sophia! I hope you post some insights on your journey. According to the BRAID Research initiative, you are like a lot of women in taking Intro CS classes later in college. I mentioned it in this recent post : https://medium.com/@lauren4tech/discovering-untapped-talent-for-tech-careers-cfe14f866969 It seems like Harvey Mudd is doing a good job turning this around, but there’s still a lot to learn. Thanks for sharing your story.
